physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 4 x 5 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: On envelope: "#385 Pueblo - 1921 (Negatives for #383, #384, #385 are combined in one envelope) B18." On photograph: "Pueblo after flood 1921, Union Ave, Donated by Mrs. Ruth Stein, #385, Credit Steele, Photographer Pueblo." On front of photograph: "Grand Ave. at Victoria, Pueblo 6-6-21, 46 Steele."

mods.abstract: View of the aftermath of the Flood of 1921 in Pueblo from the corner of Grand Ave and Victoria. Men can be seen cleaning in the background and a cart of dead horses is in the foreground.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
